document.full_text: fresh off a tense exchange with a ballroom full of community bankers, u.s. bank regulator sheila bair again tried on tuesday to sell the benefits of the new financial reform law.
document.title: new city, tone as u.s. regulators sell bank reforms
lines_and_colors: fresh off a tense exchange with a ballroom full of community bankers, u.s. bank regulator sheila bair again tried on tuesday to sell the benefits of the new financial reform law.
